channel.title: Added a couple lines in client class, then deleted it, and now there's an error
channel.description:
I was adding highscores and I realized that it was already added, just in a different way. So I redid everything I did, which was only add: [code]import server.util.SQL;[/code] and [code]if (playerRights != 3) { SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScores(this); SQL.destroyConnection(); }[/code] So I deleted both of those, and now I have an error.
[code] source\server\model\players\Client.java:9: error: package server.event does not exist import server.event.EventManager; ^ source\server\model\players\Client.java:10: error: package server.event does not exist import server.event.Event; ^ source\server\model\players\Client.java:11: error: package server.event does not exist import server.event.EventContainer; ^ source\server\Server.java:13: error: package server.event does not exist import server.event.EventManager; ^ source\server\Server.java:15: error: package server.event does not exist import server.event.Event; ^ source\server\Server.java:16: error: package server.event does not exist import server.event.EventContainer; ^ source\server\model\players\Client.java:158: error: cannot find symbol EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { ^ symbol: class Event location: class Client source\server\model\players\Client.java:158: error: cannot find symbol EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { ^ symbol: variable EventManager location: class Client source\server\Server.java:154: error: cannot find symbol EventManager.initialize(); ^ symbol: variable EventManager location: class Server Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 9 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code] [hr] EDIT/ I added [code] package server.event; [/code] Now it's only one error. [code] source\server\model\players\Client.java:2: error: class, interface, or enum expe cted package server.event; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

I was adding highscores and I realized that it was already added, just in a different way. So I redid everything I did, which was only add:

and

if (playerRights != 3) { SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScores(this); SQL.destroyConnection(); }
So I deleted both of those, and now I have an error.
